enhanced_by.reason: The unify method calls sequenceUnify when both lhs and rhs are instances of Sequence, indicating a strong state dependency.
The compose method is used to combine maps of variables and terms, which is similar to the unification process in the unify method.
The sequenceApply method is used to apply substitutions to sequences, which is similar to the output of the unify method when dealing with sequences.
The SubstitutionResult.create method is used to create the result of the unification process, which is directly related to the output of the unify method.
